body:
<!-- Please only use this template for submitting enhancement requests -->

**What would you like to be added**:
We want to add another arg for `NodeResourcesFit` plugin that is `ignoredResourcePrefixes`.

**Why is this needed**:
We know that Kubernetes support [custom extended resource](https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/configuration/manage-compute-resources-container/#extended-resources) in container resources,  it is checked in the `NodeResourcesFit` plugin when the container is scheduled, and the custom extended resources can be set to ignore through `NodeResourcesFit` plugin arg `ignoredResources`, and that can be handled by custom scheduler framework plugin.
But in our scenario, the extended resource name is dynamic generation, such as `example.com/rc1`, `example.com/rc2`, where `rc1` and `rc2` are dynamic, we cannot use `ignoredResources` arg to ignore the resource since we don't know the next generate extended resource name, but they have the same prefix `example.com`. So we want to extend the `NodeResourcesFit` plugin arg by adding `ignoredResourcePrefixes`, it can be set a list of extended resource prefixes that `NodeResourcesFit` plugin should ignore.

related pr: https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/88842

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a new feature.
labels.name: kind/feature

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG Scheduling.

title: add another arg for NodeResourcesFit plugin
